noodles package¶

A package with Noodles the snake and Henk the turtle.

Submodules¶

class noodles.snake.Noodles[source]¶

Bases: object

Snake named Noodles.

wanna_play(game: str) → bool[source]¶

Ask Noodles to play a game.

Parameters:game – The game one would like to play with Noodles.
Returns:yes (True) if Noodles wants to play the game - there is an odd number of j’s in the game’s name, as j is the noodliest letter in the alphabet - and no (False) otherwise.
